posts.postText:
I talked with Gash about something like that. Or at least the voteban part. Voteban dose not work well with easyban, apperently. I don't know if being able to change map would be a good idea... Shit... there are a few vips that I wouldn't even trust !gag with let alone changing the map to whatever they want... 24/7 Peachs Caslts is what I see in that future.

Wait... you get 20 points per ever 30mins... wtf... I only get 10. I slap you in face... Plus votekick works like a slay if you wait for the round to start.

Not to say I don't like the idea of having admin powers without being an admin. In any case... 40 points per ever 30 min is awesome idea... Points... like heroin to a crak baby.

I'm assuming you found this on the recent thread link on the portal.

This is for jail, not ttt.
No peaches castle there. 
And jail isn't hooked up to easyban
Well, in that case I am going to need to take my foot out of my mouth... I needed the posts anyway ^.^
"Shitposts" don't count for posts if you are trying to apply for mod.
